00029 function simbio_tokenizeCQL($str_query, $arr_searcheable_fields, $arr_stop_words = array(), $int_max_words = 20)
00030 {
00031     // buffer vars
00032     $_array_queries = array();
00033     $_new_q = '';
00034     $_last_boolean = '+';
00035     $_previous_field = 'title';
00036     $_current_field = 'title';
00037     $_phrase = '';
00038     // make sure there is no spaces between equation mark
00039     $str_query = preg_replace('@\s+=\s+@i', '=', $str_query);
00040     // inside quote flag
00041     $_inside_quote = false;
00042     // tokenizing string one by one
00043     $_token = strtok(strtolower($str_query), " \n\t");
00044     // word counter
00045     $_word_count = 0;
00046     while ($_token !== false) {
00047         // SAFEGUARD!
00048         if ($_word_count > $int_max_words) {
00049             break;
00050         }
00051         $_token = trim($_token);
00052         // check for stopwords
00053         if (in_array($_token, $arr_stop_words) AND !$_inside_quote) {
00054             // do nothing
00055             $_token = strtok(" \n\t");
00056             continue;
00057         }
00058         // check boolean mode
00059         if (in_array($_token, array('exact', 'and', 'or', 'not'))) {
00060             if ($_token == 'exact' AND !$_inside_quote) {
00061                 $_last_boolean = '++';
00062             } else if ($_token == 'or' AND !$_inside_quote) {
00063                 $_last_boolean = '*';
00064             } else if ($_token == 'not' AND !$_inside_quote) {
00065                 $_last_boolean = '-';
00066             } else {
00067                 $_last_boolean = '+';
00068             }
00069             // we continue to the next loop
00070             $_token = strtok(" \n\t");
00071             continue;
00072         }
00073         // check for current field
00074         foreach ($arr_searcheable_fields as $_search_field) {
00075             if ((strpos($_token, $_search_field.'=') === 0) AND !$_inside_quote) {
00076                 $_current_field = $_search_field;
00077                 $_token = str_replace($_search_field.'=', '', $_token);
00078                 if ($_word_count > 0) {
00079                     $_array_queries[] = array('f' => 'boolean', 'b' => $_last_boolean);
00080                 }
00081                 $_last_boolean = '+';
00082             }
00083         }
00084         // check if we are inside quotes
00085         if (strpos($_token, '"') === 0) {
00086             $_inside_quote = true;
00087             // remove the first quote
00088             $_token = substr_replace($_token, '', 0, 1);
00089         }
00090         if ($_inside_quote) {
00091             if (strpos($_token, '"') === strlen($_token)-1) {
00092                 $_inside_quote = false;
00093                 $_phrase .= str_replace('"', '', $_token);
00094                 $_array_queries[] = array('f' => $_current_field, 'b' => $_last_boolean, 'q' => $_phrase, 'is_phrase' => 1);
00095                 // reset
00096                 $_phrase = '';
00097             } else {
00098                 $_phrase .= str_replace('"', '', $_token).' ';
00099                 // we continue to the next loop and concatenating words
00100                 $_token = strtok(" \n\t");
00101                 continue;
00102             }
00103         } else {
00104             $_array_queries[] = array('f' => $_current_field, 'b' => $_last_boolean, 'q' => $_token);
00105         }
00106         // set previous field flag
00107         $_previous_field = $_current_field;
00108         // re-toke
00109         $_token = strtok(" \n\t");
00110         // add word counter
00111         $_word_count++;
00112     }
00113     $_array_queries[] = array('f' => 'cql_end');
00114     return $_array_queries;
00115 }
00116 ?>
